ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client has a history of anaphylactic reactions"Potential contraindications" = "History of anaphylactic reactions""Potential contraindications" = "History of anaphylactic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP
Tetanus and pertussis vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" (where "Vaccine type" = "Pertussis-containing vaccines") AND "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus-containing vaccines")"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" (where "Vaccine type" = "Pertussis-containing vaccines") AND "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus-containing vaccines") Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP
Do not vaccinate client with pertussis and/or tetanus if the client has had a severe anaphylactic reaction to a vaccine component or reaction following a prior dose.Do not vaccinate client with pertussis and/or tetanus if the client has had a severe anaphylactic reaction to a vaccine component or reaction following a prior dose.Do not vaccinate client with pertussis and/or tetanus if the client has had a severe anaphylactic reaction to a vaccine component or reaction following a prior dose. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP
The client currently has a severe acute illness"Potential contraindications" = "Severe acute illness""Potential contraindications" = "Severe acute illness" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP
Tetanus vaccination is contraindicated"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus -containing vaccines")"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus -containing vaccines") Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP
Do not vaccinate client with tetanus as tetanus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with severe acute illnessDo not vaccinate client with tetanus as tetanus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with severe acute illnessDo not vaccinate client with tetanus as tetanus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with severe acute illness Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP

title.value: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications

description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: The client has a history of anaphylactic reactions
Tetanus and pertussis vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Do not vaccinate client with pertussis and/or tetanus if the client has had a severe anaphylactic reaction to a vaccine component or reaction following a prior dose.
The client currently has a severe acute illness
Do not vaccinate client with tetanus as tetanus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with severe acute illness
